 14:       type tST
 15:         PetscFortranAddr:: v PETSC_FORTRAN_TYPE_INITIALIZE
 16:       end type tST

 18:       ST, parameter :: SLEPC_NULL_ST = tST(0)

 20:       PetscEnum, parameter :: ST_MATMODE_COPY          =  0
 21:       PetscEnum, parameter :: ST_MATMODE_INPLACE       =  1
 22:       PetscEnum, parameter :: ST_MATMODE_SHELL         =  2
